technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentioned that it was a little weird that the college was turning into a ghost town, but did not express any strong negative affect.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation and asked questions, but did not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversed with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: What's your experience regarding COVID-19 when you first heard about it and how did you adapt it to your lifestyle or work style according to that?

vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are extremely important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering and analyzing different ideas.
